LoadJSON - Class in nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp30.recnplay
LoadJSON class is responsible for parsing the JSON file and returning the moves as an arraylist and the level number as an int to the Replay class.

loadJsonToReplay() - Method in class nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp30.recnplay.Replay
Called by the application module, which allows user to select Json file to load, feeds file name to LoadJson class which will update the local playerMoves arraylist and level int playerMoves are used by other methods in this class.
loadLevel(int) - Method in class nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp30.application.ChapsChallenge

loadPlayerMoves(String) - Method in class nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp30.recnplay.LoadJSON
User selects the chosen replay, this method converts that json file to a Arraylist of Strings which the record class can convert into moves and time.

LockedDoorTile - Class in nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp30.maze.tile
The LockedDoorTile class represents a tile that can be unlocked and moved to if the chap has the required key.
